attributes.action: BAN DFS & LAND OF LEATHER ADVERTS ON TV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ban the averts from DFS, Land of Leather and other companies that advertises Sofas, New Kitchens and suchlike on Bank Holidays.
We do not want a constent repeat of these adverts while eating our Christmas dinner, or relaxing on summer breaks.
The DFS Sale is a con, as they have a sale, at the end of the sale they extend it.
When that sale ends, another one comes along.
ENOUGH IS ENOUGH

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
